info.name: Drawio
info.description: Draw.io is integrated diagramming that works with the collaboration tools you and your team are already using. Create your diagrams directly in your ownCloud using any browser and save your work on your favorite cloud storage. For more information what you can do with draw.io see the examples: https://about.draw.io/features/examples/
info.author: Tom Needham
info.summary: Integration of Draw.io editor into ownCloud Files app for creating and modifying diagrams
